item.title: Privacy
item.description: cloud-architecture.io is owned by Soft-Practice Ltd. Soft Practice Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which Soft-Practice Ltd. collects, uses, maintains and discloses information collected from users (each, a “User”) of the cloud-architecture.io website (“Site”). This privacy policy applies to the Site and all products and services offered by cyber-shadow Ltd. Personal identification information We may collect personal identification information from Users in a variety of ways in connection with activities, services, features or resources we make available on our Site.
